titleStmt.title: SII 6.68: original edition by K. V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 68. (A.R. No. 114 of 1898). ON THE SOUTH WALL OF THE SHRINE OF THE SAME TEMPLE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . mahāmaṇḍalīśvaraN harirājavipāṭaN bhāṣaik=kutappuvarāyarkaṇḍaN muvarāyarkaṇḍaN catusamudrādhipati hariyaṇaUṭaiyār kumārā viruppaṇaUṭaiyar prithivīrājyaM paṇṇāniṉṟa cakābdaM 1000 lmel cellāniṉṟa vipavavaruṣattu tulānāyaṟṟu Aparapakṣattu navamiyum śanikkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa makattu nāḷ Irācarācavaḷanāṭṭu paṉaiyūrnāṭṭu nakaram Arumoḻite
vapurattu Uṭaiyār tiruvālīcuramuṭaiya nāyaṉār tirunāmattukkāṇi tirumaṭaiviḷākam vaṭapāṟkellai Ūravaruṭaṉ talaivāyt tavappaḻi viḻukaiyil tavappaḻi paḻitta Ittiruṉamattukkāṇikku vaṭapāṟa kellai kiḻmel tiruccūlatāparam kalliraṇṭukku teṟkkum kiḻpāṟk kellai Ūṟal melkarai maṇaviḻukkāṭṭukku tiruccūlatāparam kalliraṇṭukku meṟ
kum teṉpāṟk kellai yūṟal teṉmelakarai maṇviḻukkāṭu tiruccūlatāparam kalloṉṟukkku meṟkkum teṉpāṟk kellai Ūṟukāl vaṭakarai maṇviḻukkāṭṭukku vaṭakkum melpāṟkellai cellapiḷḷaiyār tiruviruppukku kiḻakku niṟkiṟa tiruccūlatāparam kalloṉṟukkum Iṉṉeṟ kellaiyi ṉiṟkiṟa tiruccūlatāparam kalliraṇṭukku cevvaikkum kiḻakkum Iṉṉā
ṉ kellaikkum naṭuvuṭpaṭṭa tirunāmattukkāṇi tirumaṭaiviḷākamākac cantiṟātittavaraiyum naṭakkat tavappaḻi vilaṅkak kuṭuttoma Arumoḻitevapurattu Ūravarrom Ippaṭikku Ivai Iṭaiyāṟaṉ tirumaṟumārpaṉ vaṇikapurantaraṉ Eḻuttu . Ippaṭikku Ivai Uttaraṅkiḻāṉ Appaṉ Ammai Āḻiviraṉ Eḻuttu . Ippaṭikku Ivai vaṇṇakkan Appāṇṭai Appāṇṭai
Eḻuttu . Ippaṭikku Ivai pūtattuḻāṉ cuvāmikaḷ periyapiḷḷai Eḻuttu . Ippaṭikku Ivai pālamuḻāṉ tirumaṟumārpaṉ periyapiḷḷai Eḻuttu . Ippaṭikku Ivai karuppuḻāṉ Arumoḻitevaṉ neminātaṉ Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ūravar paṇiyāl Ūrkkaṇakku viṭūrruṭaiyāṉ kaṇṇuṭaiya viraṭṭaṉ karuvuṇāyakaṉ Eḻuttu .
Digital edition of SII 6.68 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
